reviews.sentence: The room felt old in some ways as well as the hallways. The elevator were slow. The room staff were cold. And to replenish the minibar they wake you up in the middle of the morning they can probably wait to do this. The staff in the front desk need better coordination. In the fron desk Sarah was of great help solving our problems the other person lacked knowledge.

Very friendly staff and excellent hospitality. Rooms were very clean and very spacious. Staff was all very friendly. We ate at the restaurant most days and it was very good. We had a discrepancy on our bill at check out but it was quickly rectified.

Average Business Hotel. The hotel is is not bad it is very well located in the heart of Santo Domingo the only problem it is that has more than 50 years old and they had taken care about the property but you can see the age. The bed was a good place to sleep but the bathroom seems very old and outdated. Santo Domigo has been a city that has been growing a lot and with all the new hotels that had been built recently I think that you will have a plenty of better options to choose unles like me for convenience was just better to stay there.

Pleasant. My wife and I had a 40year anniversary of marriage February 28 so booked a room for two nights and in the restaurant to celebrate our anniversary. Unfortunately when down in the evening the restaurant was closed.

Over charged. Unprofessional staff. Terrible service Terrible experience. Horrible service. Stay awayI was quoted a different price online when I arrived there I was told that there was a slight price difference. Since it was late at night I was tired because of the flight I did not bother arguing just said fine. At the check out day the total was completely different up by about 30 of the original quote. The receptionist did not know what was going on could not help or even understand my simple questions. I asked for somebody who could speak English the lady who came to help will not understand enough to answer either. At that point I decided to just pay leave since it was about an hour at the reception with no solution to the problem. I left very upset because of the discourteous unprofessional rude behavior of the staff. A week after I returned home there was another charge on my card from the hotel I ended up paying almost double of my original quote price. I called several times to address the issue even wrote them several e mails explaining the whole situation but no response or even an apology for their mistakes. No help whatsoeverThe lobby area was busy crowded. Food in the breakfast was great that was probably the only thing I can appreciate about that hotel. I had recommend considering any other option since it has been a terrible experience staying with them. For that price the least I expect is somebody who is willing to explain or at least listen. I never had such experience with other hotels in Santo Domingo. Staying way from them in the future spreading the word so that people do not waste their money time.

Needs improvement. The hotel needs an urgent renovation. Food was good but too expensive bring your own water rooms are more or less clean but the whole infrastructure of the building is deteriorated. I was staying in the executive floor which only feature an occidental breakfast close to the room nothing special. The carpets in floor makes this hotel not so friendly for people that suffer from allergies like me.
Truly Royal. I have never been i a more luxurious place talk about royal the Hatian President was there when we were.

Good hotel average service. This is a very good property but needs some more attention in customer service. Upon my arrival I had to wait for more than 20 minutes to checkin as there was only one person at the front desk. Faced the same problem at checkout. Rooms are newly done and really nice. There are couple of restaurants inside the hotel. Food is ok. Nothing great about it. The service in restaurants is below average. I think that there is lack of training of the staff. They do not bother to welcome you or open the door for you. This holds true especially for the restaurant by the pool side. I really loved the lobby area as the ambience is really very good. However the coffee shop in the lobby has a very slow service. Staff is inattentive. Had to remind them again and again for the order and even for the bill. The swimming pool is very good and a good place for relaxation. The SPA too is good. They have massage as well as salon in there. The hotel is centrally located and there are few good dinning options just outside the hotel.

Our stay here has not been at all what we expected. We had stayed here in the past and had a decent stay but currently this hotel is not in good condition. The rooms have been renovated but it feels as if this was done with minimal attention to detail. For starters the rooms have motion sensors to sense when guests are not around. This will then turn off power when guests are not present to conserve energy. This sounds wonderful but has some unintended effects due to not thinking through the wiring in the room. The air conditioning is including in this power line. So during the night when guests are still the AC goes off. The rooms get hot. Also the room will not cool during the day either. No matter what time you return the room will be hot. We switched rooms and had similar issues in other rooms. Also the electrical plugs are included in this. So the phones would not charge over night. Third as soon as someone enters a room all lights will turn on in recognition of the person returning. Nice during the day. Not so nice when someone steps out to get ice at night and returns 3 minutes later to have all the lights turn on and wake up your kids. There is no option for all the lights not to turn on which is bothersome at night. The doorman is nice and the hotel is recently renovated. However the staff had minimal concerns over AC issues. Also though not under direct control of staff I am sure construction with hammers and drills starts at 8 am. So sleeping in will not be possible. The room service and restaurants were commonly out of food on their menus. The food served was average. It was OK though not what one would expect from a hotel advertised to be so nice. The staff mostly seemed confused and customer service is not up to American standards. After staying here 3 times before I did not think we will be back. We will find a different hotel for our future trips to visit with family.

Not cheap not new and rather uncomfortable. This is a dated hotel located at the malecon area. Its not cheap and the truth is you can get other more modern hotels at same or better price. Not my favorite bed very uncomfortable. Parking is kind of crazy if its crowded too.
Great hotel just fully remodeled. The French toast were not done properly.

Wedding stay. We attended a wedding and decided to enjoy the hotel for 2 nights. We stayed at a larger room with a jacuzi room 54. and it was great. Room service was impecable and vey nice and everybody at the hotel treated us like royalty. We used the lounge on the 8th floor for breakfast and it was delicious. I also used the buffet restaurant and it was great as well. Food variety was awesome. The pool and pool drinks great as well. The service was just a little slow on the pool counting that there were only a few people there. Overall great stay fancy resort and very conveniently located. We ’l be back.
Amazing. The service was excellent and have beautiful rooms. I like everything.

Amazing Hotel. One of the best Hotel. An Without doubt this Hotel become one of our favorite hotels We stayed in the capital Santo Domingo during our time in For my cousin weddings. Since we arrival we were warmly welcomed. an smile by the staff. Since I ’m a member of my Barcelo we were upgraded to the Ambassador Floor. The staff was extremely friendly and very educated and respectful person. the restaurant very flexible and the food excellent and the restaurant supervisor s chef and staff deserves a special thanks. I Also like to give special thanks to Mrs KRosario in the embassador reception Lounge. We had great time there. I love this hotel so much I ’m going back on in the summer. I also thank a lot for the help with my reservation Mr Manuel Mena Mr Franklyn in the call center. They are excellent and and they understand you needs. Thank all the staff. Excellent hotel we Recommend it.

True Royalty. Wonderful hotel with clean rooms and wonderful staff. The Hotel is very elegant. The rooms appeared to be sound proof. The grounds was well manicured and clean. There was excellent food and beverages. IT WAS AN EXCELLENT VACATION HOTEL. I hope to stay again on my next Santo Domingo trip.

Very Nice Experience Embajador Hotel. Wonderful people rooms and breakfast for business travellers in Santo Domingo. Very convenience for people love running and to be quiet and rest in a comfortable bedrooms. A huge positive change rooms layout since my last visit.

Wonderful Wedding anniversary. My wife and I had a wonderful time at El embajador. I wanted to celebrate our anniversary at the hotel. Prior to the my stay I email the hotel and received a prompt email back from Ms Patricia Santana. She made all my dreams aka requests come true. I had an early check in flowers chocolate a ready to go bathtub fully decorated with rose petals. It was a very nice surprise for my wife. Also the receptionist Tania Hernandez did a wonderful job making sure that all my requests were done prior to entering the room. Besides that the service was fantastic. I remember Ms Maria de los Santos was very friendly and effective bringing all the snacks I wanted. I highly recommend this hotel. it is beautiful and the service is 5 stars.

Felt very welcomed would recommend to anyone who wants to visit Santo Domingo. Very modern and everything is very pleasing to the eye the fresh flowers in the lobby is a beautiful touch. Staff are attentive and friendly willing to answer any questions or concerns. Would come back againMaybe we visited during off peak season so it was n’t so packed full of people there on vacation. While it seemed like most of the customers are there for business purposes which gave a more professional serious atmosphere.

Very excellent. Newly renovated rooms are wonderful and very cleanExces to biz floor is also very nice to enjoy the Beverage and drinksHotel is promoting rooms to Junior Suite without any extracharge. Rooms are excellent. Thanks.

A true royal hideaway experience. We absolutely loved every minute of our stay. We got a royal junior suite and it was amazing. To our surprise it included access to a lounge with drinks and snacks. Staff was so helpful and nice. Special thanks to Juan in the 8th floor lounge and Francesco at the door. The waiters and waitresses in the breakfast hall could have been less serious. Somehow they all looked like they hate their jobs. We came straight from a resort and the difference could not have been bigger.
